Portfolio

About

I help businesses by providing savvy front-end development for websites and applications, delivering innovative web-based business solutions. Businesses and professionals enjoy working with me because I am passionate, dedicated, and provide a range of comprehensive digital marketing services to impact business.

My talents cover a wide range of technical skills, deep knowledge of lean and agile methodologies, an artistic designer’s eye for visual detail and drive for innovation.

Connect with me today to learn how I can elevate your business to the next level.

Around the Web

About this site

Based on Freelancer, an open source Jekyll theme.

Renegade Marketing

A B2B site for a marketing consultancy group. Set up site architecture, staging servers, database, and Git repositories. Customized CMS forms through plugins and Advanced Custom Fields. Infinite scroll implemented on all post listing pages. Responsive design. Technology used: **Wordpress, PHP, MySQL, Advance Custom Fields, Git, Gulp, Node, Bootstrap 4, SASS, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS**
  • Role: Lead Front-End Developer Consultant
  • Company: Binzu Digital
  • Client: Renegade Marketing
  • Project Dates: June 2018 - September 2018
  • Posted: October 2018

Calligrahy Pack

A responsive e-commerce store with hundreds of products built on the Shopify platform with PHP and Liquid, and designed with Sketch and Photoshop. Technology used: **Shopify CMS, Liquid, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Sketch, Photoshop**
  • Role: Designer, Developer, SEO and Marketing
  • Company: Binzu Digital
  • Client: Calligraphy Pack
  • Project Dates: March 2018 - May 2018
  • Posted: October 2018

  • Company: Binzu Digital

  • Project Dates: April 2018 - July 2018
  • Posted: October 2018

Marketer Workspace

Launched new features on IBM’s global marketing platform incorporating multiple APIs, enhancing responsiveness, improving usability and data integrity.

  • Role: Applications Developer
  • Company: Ogilvy & Mather
  • Client: IBM
  • Project Dates: May 2015 - June 2017
  • Posted: August 2017

IBM Cloud Computing

Successfully revamped the IBM cloud website to new CMS and responsive layout, and drastically improved SEO and performance through collaboration in an agile development team. Developed maintainable technical documentation and an online CSS style guide, simplifying transfer of knowledge workflow and global deployment processes.

Technology used: CMS, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Grunt, Git

  • Role: Frontend Developer Lead
  • Company: Ogilvy & Mather
  • Client: IBM
  • Project Dates: February 2014 - May 2015
  • Posted: August 2017
